options.name: track
options.description: The track you'd like to play

options.name: position
options.description: 1 based index to start adding tracks from

options.name: station
options.description: The station to play from

options.name: position
options.description: 1 based index to start adding tracks from

options.name: start
options.description: 1 based index to start skipping tracks from

options.name: amount
options.description: The amount of tracks to skip in the queue

name: queue
description: Show the queue and do actions

options.name: page
options.description: Choose what page in the queue to show

options.name: volume
options.description: Set the volume % of the queue

options.name: loop
options.description: Set the state of loop mode for the queue

options.name: pause
options.description: Sets the paused state of the queue

name: nowplaying
description: Show the queue now playing message

name: trackinfo
description: Shows info about the currently playing track

name: lyrics
description: Shows the lyrics of the currently playing track

name: seek
description: Seek to a time in the currently playing track

options.name: time
options.description: The time in seconds to seek in the track

options.name: pitch
options.description: Sets the pitch of the queue in decibals

options.name: speed
options.description: Sets the speed % of the queue

name: musictoken
description: Obtain a web dashboard login token

options.name: action
options.description: What to do

options.name: meta
options.description: Metadata commands

options.name: add
options.description: Adds a track to a playlist

options.name: remove
options.description: Removes a track from a playlist

options.name: move
options.description: Moves a track in a playlist from one index to another

options.name: search
options.description: Filters tracks in a playlist

options.name: play
options.description: Plays a playlist

options.name: window
options.description: The type of stats to show

name: git
